Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/List/lastIndexOf
Synopsis Return index of last occurence of elt in lst, or -1 if elt is not found.
Function int lastIndexOf(list[&T] lst, &T elt)
Usage import List;
Description Also see indexOf.
Examples 
rascal>import List;
ok
rascal>lastIndexOf([3, 1, 4, 5, 4], 4);
int: 4
rascal>lastIndexOf([3, 1, 4, 5, 4], 7);
int: -1
rascal>lastIndexOf(["zebra", "owl", "elephant", "snake", "owl"], "owl");
int: 4
